itemDescription: British rugby player and association football player (1929-2014)

wikipedia_page.main: Geoffrey Mottram Richards (24 April 1929 – 8 May 2014) was an English professional footballer who played as a winger.

response: * 15 May 2014: Geoff Richards, 85, former West Bromwich Albion F.C. winger.
*Geoff Richards, 85, English footballer (West Brom), pneumonia.Tributes to former Baggies winger Geoff Richards

* Geoff Richards (professor), Director of AO Research and Development at the AO Foundation
